# Insurance Data Analysis

### Importing Datasets

```{r}

## Part 1 - Data Exploration

train_stats = dfSummary(num_insur_dat, stats = c("mean", "sd", "med", "IQR", "min", "max", "valid", "n.missing"))

view(train_stats)
```
